entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deadlock on EventSource.EventListenersLock between EventPipeEventDispatcher.StopDispatchTask() and EventSource.Initialize() #86838
  • Consider increasing reservoir's size for GDV candidates #86837
    Future
  • Where is RandomAccess.Flush(bool)? #86836
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Leading Unicode Whitespace in NumberStyles #86834
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty / ThrowIfNull / ThrowIfNullOrWhiteSpace with custom message #86833
  • could not able to install .net in rhel9 manually using "dotnet-sdk-6.0-6.0.116-2.el9.x86_64.rpm" file #86831
  • [API Proposal]: `ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty` for collection #86830
  • Unify tryrun scripts #86829
  • [NativeAOT] EventPipe current_thread_get_id performance #86828
    8.0.0
  • Document tiered compilation events #86826
    Future

Closed

  • GZipStream produces different results on Windows and Ubuntu #86824
  • ETL for Tiered Compilation Settings not showing the TieredPGO flag? #84607
    8.0.0
  • [linux-arm64] System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException in AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs.InvokeContinuation #84407
    6.0.x
  • SslStream fails to authenticate in .NET 7.0 but works in .NET 6.0 #83455
    7.0.x
  • Provide a runtime package through the store #86808

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up BB successor iteration #86839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • The CLA bot can now be rerun with a comment. Fix broken CLA links. #86825
    documentation, NO-MERGE, area-Meta

Merged

  • Multiple GDV: ignore non-inlineable candidates #86835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix tiered PGO info in TC Settings event #86827
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix packs subset build #86832
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT build and runtime pack for linux-bionic #86781
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `u8` literals in `ManagedTextSection`. #86657
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution

Updated

  • Expose DOTNET_JitPrintInlinedMethods in Release #84606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2189470 #86818
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix ID regression in Alpine Linux builds #86804
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • {U}Int128 support for Utf8Formatter/Parser #86357
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Exploit unallocated zero page to remove null checks in jiterpreter #86403
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run sdk tests on wasm PRs #86744
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler doesn't enforce init-only property assignments in a copy constructor #68346
  • Copy constructor should not be allowed to omit this initializer call in a type that is not a record #68345

PullRequests

Created

  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged

Updated

  • Don't give duplicate member error for explicit implementations of different file-local interfaces with same source name #68331
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix completions after `unsafe` in using directive #68334
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem with CodeBehind PartialClass and inheritance. #48470
  • ASP.NET Implicitly Enables Authorization and Authentication #48469
    Discussions
  • Broken link in CONTRIBUTING.md #48468
  • Use of compounding bitwise |= true #48464

Closed

  • Change the file extension of .razor to .raz #48452
  • .NET 6 #48456
  • Way to programmatically parse .razor (blazor) files and get an object model #48449
  • model binding to one class doesn't work as expected and documented #48391

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix redundant use of compounding bitwise |= true #48466
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Modify emitted ESM modules for SignalR JS/TS client to work in browser. #48465
    area-signalr

Updated

  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2189463 #48387
    area-mvc
  • Avoid repetitive GCHandles in IIS WebSocket operations #48462
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    blocked, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting MinimumDate and MaximumDate in DatePicker breaks the calendar view. #15309
  • Winform BlazorWebView: Unable to open multiple Winform windows with BlazorWebView content #15308

PullRequests

Merged

Updated

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
